name: Draco Power
description: You channel the elemental energy within your ancestry to unleash a legendary power. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d6 + MOVE dragon damage and 1d6 + MOVE damage of one of the following types: fire, water, grass, electric.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d6 at level 10, and 2d8 at level 17.
